moves.details: Remove the initialLoadComplete state and 1+ second delays that destroy UX. Keep only essential hydration safety.
Use CSS transitions during hydration, then enhance with Framer Motion after mount. No functionality delays.
Only use AnimatePresence after hydration is complete. Use static divs with CSS transitions during initial render.
Allow notifications to appear immediately when online status changes, using CSS animations during hydration.

moves.description: Test the surgical fix maintains functionality
moves.details: Verify notifications appear immediately, animations work after hydration, and no hydration errors occur.
